author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign BEST WEAPONS for Every Class & Boss
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, we're going to be talking about the best weapons for each class or each Nightfarer and specifically against each boss. Not even a weapon is effective against every boss. So if you've been wondering, like what weapons to look out for, and you know what you should be going for in certain bosses, we're going to go through each one of these classes and make some recommendations.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:
0:00 Nightreign OP Weapons
0:35 Wylder Best Weapons
3:23 Ironeye Best Weapons
6:30 Raider Best Weapons
10:37 Duchess Best Weapons
15:33 Guardian Best Weapons
